I am alive... of course I just joined... Does anyone happen to have the original Gladiator zip file... I mean, I remember the password to unlock it and everything (I purchased the game a long time ago), I've since then lost the file (hard drive crash) and I can't get the OpenGlad to run Fullscreen... Anyone who can help?
 
Thanks,
~TJ
